amendatorysection.catchline: Powers relating to rights of survivorship and beneficiary designations.
amendatorysection.para: An agent or attorney in fact under a durable power of attorney may do the following on behalf of the principal or with the principal's property only if the durable power of attorney expressly grants the agent or attorney in fact the authority and exercise of the authority is not otherwise prohibited by another agreement or instrument to which the authority or property is subject:
(1) Create or change rights of survivorship; or
(2) Create or change a beneficiary designation.
